sheet.name: en
sheet.text: I just wish I had trained more before I fought earlier.
I was actually thinking the same thing.
This fight is likely far from over.
All we need to focus on is getting stronger and winning. That's what matters most now.
Shall we have a battle? For the sake of training, of course.
It's a tried-and-true method, at the end of the day.
I suppose it has. We can at least agree on that.
Well, SOMEONE was certainly all fired up!
Is that bitterness I detect? From losing, perhaps?
You wanna go again? 'Cause I can do this alllll day!
We must seek out Arle and the others.
Quitting while the going's good, huh!? Well, fine!
Draco, what in the world are you staring at?
There certainly have been a lot of unusual Puyos lately.
I'm not sure if the Dimensional Parasite is responsible for them.
They're so cute... kind of like little candy bits.
They're just so strange. Even spells are cast differently.
It sure is a lot harder... *thinking sounds*
Could you play around with those Tiny Puyos, Draco?
You'll get some practice out of it.
A win-win? I hardly see how—
Don't worry about it! Now go on and play with the Tiny Puyos!
I don't understand, but all right!
Due to their smaller size, these Puyos can utilize more field space.
And if one manages to attain these large Chains...
*giggle* I think I'm starting to get it.
All I know is I had a good time!
...At least one of us gets it.
Like this? No, no, I've gotta go like this...
What are you up to, Klug?
You know how I'm constantly striving to do my best and all.
So I wanted to train, even if it has to be alone.
Ah, I think I get what you're up to.
Keep it up, Klug. I know how important battles are.
But I also know how important it is to improve yourself, even if you have to put in the effort alone.
*moved to tears* You have such a way with words, Lemres!
Sure thing. You want to battle, I take it?
I'd like you to stand by and bear witness to the fruits of my labor!
I... I'd be honored to have you cheer me on!
*maniacal chuckle* Nothing can stop the might of a hundred Klugs!
Personally, I thought my performance was nothing short of spectacular!
Uh, yeah. That was... That was definitely a spectacle...
Then I'm going to continue my training!
I might even be able to take down Lemres one day...
Well, seems like he's lost in his own world now.
I appreciate how much he seems to admire me.
But I just never know what to do in these situations...
So after a set interval, Puyos and Tetriminos alternate.
I'm trying to figure out this ruleset I'm not too familiar with.
The one with spinning and swapping?
I'm about to figure it all out.
I'm embarrassed to say I'm having trouble with that ruleset myself.
Would you mind helping me practice?
I think I've got the hang of it now.
It was nothing, really. I just wish I could've been more helpful...
The key is to take advantage of the alternating fields and to strike with successive moves.
There are probably certain things you can only do with this ruleset.
Well, here's a piece of candy for your trouble.
Did you go out of your way... for me?
All I want is to make everything as fun as possible. ♪
But you bullies keep getting in my way.
It doesn't matter whether your intentions are good or bad!
We have to stop what you're doing!
Then maybe we can try to be friends after!
Yeah! We've gotta fight in the name of justice and morals and other good stuff!
Hey! She's about to get away AGAIN!
You're not getting away this time!
Gotta say, I'm not too crazy about the idea.
But we don't really have a choice... ★
Our culprit isn't exactly the well-behaved sort.
No, she isn't! That's why I'm counting on you!
You're... at large! Just keep your eyes peeled for trouble!
Hmm. That sounds like a job for someone without any skills...
Well, yeah, that does sound like you. But you said it, not me.
Well, you ARE willing to help us no matter what.
Yeah. That's pretty much all I got.
Well, that's good enough for me!
So let's get a move on!
Whoa, whoa, WHOA! She's coming this way!
I-I mean, I won't let... *inaudible mumble*
Of course we won't! After all, I'm here!
Ha-HAH! Let me show you how it's done!
Hope you didn't think you'd get away that easily.
You have yet to pay for what you've done...
Why don't we talk about it?
Otherwise, how are we supposed to understand each other?
*groan* It hurts! Why does it hurt so badly!?
I WILL be the last one standing. I WILL be victorious.
Not having fun anymore, I take it?
I've never had this much fun in... EVER! *maniacal giggle*
I can't bring myself to look at her.
Hmph. That doesn't sound like you at all.
The girl whose stare can crush an entire family of cockroaches from across the room?
You came all this way only to back down now?
You've got to go at her with all of your might.
If you don't, she may never snap out of it.
...Such supportive words from my Dark Prince.
We'll block off her escape. Just leave it to us!
You can't bust out freshwater moves in a saltwater scene, catch my drift?
So let's blow 'em outta the water, baby!
Okay, I'm ready to give it another shot!
I don't get it... How can I be so fun and still lose?
Guess that's all we can do.
She's headed your way, Tee! It's up to you now!
Let's end this once and for all!
Leave it to me! Let's go, O!
It takes courage to ask for help.
You're getting on my nerves! Out of my way!
We're preparing to apprehend the Dimensional Parasite.
Upon successful capture, she'll be in our custody.
Custody, shmustody. Let's just tie her feet to the ceiling and let her dangle upside down!
A few days of that, and she'll be begging for mercy!
That girl seems like she's trying to control everyone...
...but she's actually the one being controlled!
Hm... My scanners aren't detecting her as the source, either.
Quit spouting nonsense! We need to hurry and—
Ess, it appears the girl was never an evil entity to begin with.
Violence is definitely not the answer! It's cruel and pointless!
...Well, THAT seemed like a healthy change in attitude.
At any rate, let's get this over with.
It's time we helped the Dimensional Parasite.
We'll battle her until she's rid of her pain and loneliness!
Here she is. Except she's, well...
I can't just stop battling like you want.
I don't want to be doing this!
It doesn't matter how many times I battle...
None of it feels fun at all!
I'm sorry to ask, but please.
If that's the case, then leave it to us!
Yay! We were able to talk through this at the end of the day!
All right, Carby. Looks like we've got some more work to do!
You have your own story and your own reasons.
All of us here understand that.
Thank you for trusting us to help you.
We'll do what we can to get you out of your situation.
So, this is who you really are.
Hear, hear! I'd like to say a few words.
We all figured you were going through a lot.
Um, yeah... But you can trust us!
How'd you get the nickname "Dimensional Parasite"?
Calling you that now doesn't seem very nice.
Actually... I'm not the Dimensional Parasite.
What do you think you're doing, Marle?
